Fetch Data from Yahoo Finance

Source: R/fetch.R
fetch_yahoo.Rd

Fetch OHLCV data directly from Yahoo Finance. This is a free data source that doesn't require an API key and supports stocks, ETFs, indices, crypto, and futures.

Usage

fetch_yahoo(
  tickers,
  from = Sys.Date() - 365,
  to = Sys.Date(),
  auto_adjust = TRUE,
  periodicity = "daily"
)

Arguments

tickers

Character vector: ticker symbols

from

Date or character: start date

to

Date or character: end date

auto_adjust

Logical: adjust for splits/dividends (default: TRUE)

periodicity

Character: "daily", "weekly", "monthly" (default: "daily")

Value

A market_tbl object

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Fetch Apple stock
aapl <- fetch_yahoo("AAPL", from = "2024-01-01")

# Multiple stocks
tech <- fetch_yahoo(c("AAPL", "MSFT"), from = "2023-01-01")

# Bitcoin
btc <- fetch_yahoo("BTC-USD", from = "2024-01-01")
} # }
